Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0310_010_1.Text: *: This is my horse. He is a fine steed. Strong and true. Perhaps the hoof-rot will not take him as it did his brothers.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320_010_1.Text: *: My horse is a good horse. But he does not speak. Not like some... But he has been spared the hoof-rot, colic and the worst of the mange, and for this I give thanks to the Goddess.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_1.Text: Why, howdy there! I'm Ed, the talkin' horse! Mighty fine to make your acquaintance. How 'bout I tell y'all somethin' real nice?

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0410_010_2.Text: If y'all get a hold o' the old bottomless pot, you might think about tryin' it out over in the shallows off to the north-west there...

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0510_010_1.Text: *: They say the echo flute can be found in a tall tower. If you work hard and say your prayers, perhaps you will live to see it one day.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0610_010_1.Text: *: Our people do not lie. We do not see the purpose of falsehood. Every man must learn to face the truth...however painful.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_0810_010_1.Text:
*: Welcome to the village of Persistence.
You must have endured great hardship to reach us.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_010_3.Text: ...and a monster is revealed before your eyes!

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1010_010_5.Text: {LEADER} calms the monster with a soothing voice and tells it about Monty's monster menagerie...

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_010_1.Text: *: You may have noticed that there are some great boulders to the north, east and west of Persistence.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Out_SUB_0_ACTOR_1110_010_2.Text: *: The villagers say it's good luck to touch all of them. I would visit the rocks too, but the thought of leaving scares me.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Room01_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: *: East from here as the crow flies is a clearing on the coast. Did you see a town there?
*: You did? Then I give thanks that the people there have not succumbed to fever, famine or venomous beasts.
*: A settler from our village set out to build a town there, and has not returned. I expect he is in heaven with my brothers and my sisters and my wife and my thirteen little ones...

Txt_Talk_Soo_Room02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: *: To the far north lies an island wrapped all around in ice.

*: In the far corner of the plain there lives a warlock<--->an unrepentant user of magic, and a stranger to honest labour. Do not smile, friend. If the Goddess had wanted Her children to use magic, She would have given us wands instead of arms.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Room02_SUB_0_ACTOR_0210_010.Text: *: The echo flute will find the orbs. When one is nearby, the flute's call will return to you. Perseverance will out.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Room03_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010.Text: *: The bottomless pot was made by our people.
*: But it was taken from us by strangers from the East. I daresay they will return and take what little we have left someday.

Txt_Talk_Soo_Room03_SUB_0_ACTOR_0120_010.Text: *: Zzz... Thief... Return it to us... Mmm... The bottomless pot is ours... We must... Mmm... Fill it up... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Soo_Room03_SUB_0_ACTOR_0320_010.Text: *: Zzz... Mmm? ...What is it? ...The bottomless pot? You must ask my husband. Mmm... Zzz...

Txt_Talk_Soo_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_1.Text: *: Oh, crikey! Rumbled, after all this time! Alright, alright, it's a fair cop!

Txt_Talk_Soo_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_2.Text: *: I'll get it back! I'll get you your bottomless blooming pot back at the first opportunity!

Txt_Talk_Soo_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_3.Text: *: Oh, wait a second... You're not from the village, are you?

Txt_Talk_Soo_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_4.Text: *: This is jolly embarrassing, but I'm actually a soldier from Edina. Well, I was, at any rate. I came here on an expedition donkey's years ago...

Txt_Talk_Soo_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_5.Text: *: But when the time came to set sail for home, I was five minutes late, and my comrades clean forgot about me!

Txt_Talk_Soo_Well_SUB_0_ACTOR_0110_010_6.Text: *: They didn't forget their precious blessed pot, of course. Oh, no... I'm quite sure that made it back.
